author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Tampa couple helps give back through Feeding Tampa Bay's Trinity Cafe
text:
Summary by Ground News Nearly one million people are food insecure in Tampa Bay. Volunteers at Feeding Tampa Bay's Trinity Caf� serve lunch on Thursdays. Diane and Willie Martinez have been married for 24 years. They care and get to know the people who walk through the doors, while encouraging everyone to give back their time. Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
abc Action News Center High Factuality Corporation: E. W. Scripps Company Tampa couple helps give back through Feeding Tampa Bay's Trinity Cafe Nearly one million people are food insecure in Tampa Bay. Here at ABC Action News, weve teamed up with Feeding Tampa Bay for our Food for Families initiative.A huge part of making their mission happen comes down to the volunteers.I always tell all the groups that come this is going to be the quickest two hours of your week, said Diane Martinez.On Thursdays at Feeding Tampa Bays Trinity Caf off Nebraska Avenue in Tampa, youll find Diane and Willi…
